New Records: The match was decided by a penalty after a small mistake by a Vietnamese player
Key Match Events: Vietnam's midfield couldn't maintain possession leading to their defeat
Vietnam missed their star player and his replacement underperformed
Pre-Game Insights: Vietnam expected a tough game against a strong Indonesian team with naturalized players
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Troussier expressed disappointment over the loss and the early elimination from the Asian Cup group stage
He highlighted the importance of the last match against Iraq
Miscellaneous Highlights: Vietnam's performance wasn't up to their usual standards
The loss led to early elimination from the group stage
